text: minisunē! niyata vaśayenma api obava ek pirimiyeku hā gæhæniyakuge-nma utpādanaya kaḷemu. pasuva keneku anit kenāva han̆dunā gænīma piṇisa jātīn bavaṭada, gōtrikayin bavaṭada pat kaḷemu. (ebævin obagen keneku anit kenāṭa vaḍā usas yayi āḍambara bas deḍīmaṭa taram dæyak næta. ehet) obagen kavurun itāmat bhaya bhaktikayin vaśayen siṭinnēda, ohuma niyata vaśayenma allāhgē sannidhānayehi itāmat gauravaṇīya keneku vannēya. niyata vaśayenma allāh (siyalla) hon̆din danneku hā hon̆din dænuvat keneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
